title: Re: Edward Scissorhands....
content:
i dont understand.   
i'm not asking for pirate copies of anything..   
dont understand the 'three strikes' comment either.   
seems brash..   
i understand all of the ethical reasoning.   
   
i simply asked if anyone knows of a good resource for finding a typeface much like 'luther' that may not be forty dollars.   
   
no harm is/was meant.
author: at_zero
